channel.title: Online Player count
channel.description:
Hey again people! And if youe wondering why am i posting a new top then edititing the other1, im still waiting to help and i dont want it to be to much to ask.
Here is my questions: I want to learn how to make the online players script and add it to my webserver. Can someone help me with it plz?
~Killmoman~

item.title: Online Player count
item.dc:creator: @chrham2 chrham2
item.description:
@chrham2 wrote:

Well, I have no idea, but WOW, 1 post and every replys are just discussions!

item.title: Online Player count
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“nueb35, post:5, topic:265828”][quote author=killmoman link=topic=350978.msg2695928#msg2695928 date=1236277150]
lol thx for taking up for me dude, also i reported you for flaming me cain_
[/quote]

reported cain_, lol

also, make a php script to connect to your server make this same script send some bytes, lets say 0xCAFED00D (yes i know, jar etc.) your server then reads these bytes and sends out the appropriate http headers or just the number of players currently online. easy enough eh?[/quote]

that… or he could just not be a pussy, and shoot himself in the head

Read full topic

item.title: Online Player count
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

killmoman:

lol thx for taking up for me dude, also i reported you for flaming me cain_

reported cain_, lol

also, make a php script to connect to your server make this same script send some bytes, lets say 0xCAFED00D (yes i know, jar etc.) your server then reads these bytes and sends out the appropriate http headers or just the number of players currently online. easy enough eh?
